title: Functions of the Grid: Reloading
body:
Functions of the Grid: Reloading¶

When the page needs to be refreshed (e.g. page has timed out, a record has recently been added and has not yet appeared), you should reload the page.
You should navigate to the page you wish to reload using in the ribbon.

  1. Simply click in the right hand corner of the page
